meanings.sent1: The crabbed old man yelled at the kids playing near his yard.
meanings.sent2: She was in a crabbed mood after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The crabbed cat refused to be petted and hissed at anyone who came close.
meanings.sent4: His crabbed attitude made it hard for others to approach him.
meanings.sent5: The crabbed customer complained about everything in the restaurant.

meanings.sent1: The handwriting on the old document was crabbed and hard to understand.
meanings.sent2: The crabbed text in the ancient book required a magnifying glass to decipher.
meanings.sent3: The crabbed notes scribbled on the paper were illegible to everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her crabbed writing style made it challenging for others to follow her notes.
meanings.sent5: The crabbed code in the puzzle took hours to crack.

meanings.definition: Having a crab-like appearance or movement
meanings.sent1: The crabbed creature scuttled along the sandy beach.
meanings.sent2: The crabbed robot moved sideways just like a real crab.
meanings.sent3: The crabbed toy had tiny legs that moved in a sideways motion.
meanings.sent4: The crabbed vehicle mimicked the sideways movement of a crab.
meanings.sent5: The crabbed costume made the actor look like a real crustacean.
